intro: Stephaniscus gabonensis, commonly known as the Gabon stephanis, is a flowering plant native to Central Africa. It belongs to the family Malvaceae and is characterized by its large, showy yellow flowers. The plant typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 5 meters. Its leaves are simple, alternate, and often have a velvety texture. It is adapted to tropical climates and thrives in well-drained soils.
